results.name: Log_2 (n) mod 13.
reference: H. Y. Song and S. W. Golomb, Generalized Welch-Costas sequences and their application to Vatican arrays, in Proc. 2nd International Conference on Finite Fields: Theory, Algorithms and Applications (Las Vegas 1993) Contemp. Math. vol. 168 344 1994.
I. M. Vinogradov, Elements of Number Theory, p. 220.
mathematica: a[1] = 0; a[n_] := MultiplicativeOrder[2, 13, {n}]; Array[a, 12] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 09 2018 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
